title: Cherry cake using savarin tin
ingredients: ['100g butter, softened', '75g cake margarine, softened', '175g caster sugar', '225g self raising flour', '3 large eggs, lightly beaten', '200g glace cherries, roughly chopped', '50g ground almonds', 'zest of 1 lemon', 'For decoration', '175g icing sugar', 'lemon juice', '5 glace cherries, quartered', '15g flaked almonds, toasted']
